LayerType: Type of HLOD generation to use
CellSize: Cell size of the runtime grid created to encompass HLOD actors generated for this HLOD Layer
LoadingRange: Loading range of the runtime grid created to encompass HLOD actors generated for this HLOD Layer
ParentLayer: HLOD Layer to assign to the generated HLOD actors
HLODActorClass: Specify a custom HLOD Actor class, the default is AWorldPartitionHLOD
HLODModifierClass: HLOD Modifier class, to allow changes to the HLOD at runtime
bIsSpatiallyLoaded: Whether HLOD actors generated for this layer will be spatially loaded
